name: Zeppi's Moonlit Misadventure
description:
Follow the clown-in-training Zeppi on his journey through the dark woods, chasing an unknown thief and navigating through uncertain terrain.  Solve puzzles and move through the forest in order to secure employment at the circus and watch out for any unseen foes.
